DOC.brief_summary: Adding sufentanyl to bupivacain in Transversus Abdominis Plane (TAP) block under ultrasound guide can reduce narcotic dosage, side effects and pain after cesarean delivery.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Adding Sufentanyl to Bupivacaine in Transversus Abdominis Plane Block to Reduce the Narcotic Dosage and Pain After Cesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: female 18 to 40 Years class ASA 1 and 2 candidates for elective cesarean section renal failure liver failure cardiac disorder coagulopathy hepatomegaly splenomegaly drug sensitivity and abuse morbid obesity smoking history of post operative nausea and vomiting motion sickness local hypoesthesia
